Debian

Archive Key

wget -O - https://packages.icinga.com/icinga.key | apt-key add -
# or
curl https://packages.icinga.com/icinga.key | apt-key add -

Debian Backports

Some of the packages may require Debian Backports repository. Make sure you enable it when you see dependecy problems.

Release Builds

icinga-buster i386 amd64 

deb http://packages.icinga.com/debian icinga-buster main
deb-src http://packages.icinga.com/debian icinga-buster main

icinga-stretch i386 amd64 

deb http://packages.icinga.com/debian icinga-stretch main
deb-src http://packages.icinga.com/debian icinga-stretch main

Or if you are a lazy one:

DIST=$(awk -F"[)(]+" '/VERSION=/ {print $2}' /etc/os-release); \
 echo "deb http://packages.icinga.com/debian icinga-${DIST} main" > \
 /etc/apt/sources.list.d/${DIST}-icinga.list
 echo "deb-src http://packages.icinga.com/debian icinga-${DIST} main" >> \
 /etc/apt/sources.list.d/${DIST}-icinga.list

Testing (Pre Release) Builds

These are pre release builds which are not recommended for production use. If you're setting up a production system please use the release packages instead.

icinga-buster-testing i386 amd64 

deb http://packages.icinga.com/debian icinga-buster-testing main
deb-src http://packages.icinga.com/debian icinga-buster-testing main

icinga-stretch-testing i386 amd64 

deb http://packages.icinga.com/debian icinga-stretch-testing main
deb-src http://packages.icinga.com/debian icinga-stretch-testing main

Or if you are a lazy one:

DIST=$(awk -F"[)(]+" '/VERSION=/ {print $2}' /etc/os-release); \
 echo "deb http://packages.icinga.com/debian icinga-${DIST}-testing main" > \
 /etc/apt/sources.list.d/${DIST}-icinga-testing.list
 echo "deb-src http://packages.icinga.com/debian icinga-${DIST}-testing main" >> \
 /etc/apt/sources.list.d/${DIST}-icinga-testing.list

Snapshot Builds

These are snapshot builds which are not suitable for production use. If you're setting up a production system please use the release packages instead.

icinga-buster-snapshots i386 amd64 

deb http://packages.icinga.com/debian icinga-buster-snapshots main
deb-src http://packages.icinga.com/debian icinga-buster-snapshots main

icinga-stretch-snapshots i386 amd64 

deb http://packages.icinga.com/debian icinga-stretch-snapshots main
deb-src http://packages.icinga.com/debian icinga-stretch-snapshots main

Or if you are a lazy one:

DIST=$(awk -F"[)(]+" '/VERSION=/ {print $2}' /etc/os-release); \
 echo "deb http://packages.icinga.com/debian icinga-${DIST}-snapshots main" > \
 /etc/apt/sources.list.d/${DIST}-icinga-snapshots.list
 echo "deb-src http://packages.icinga.com/debian icinga-${DIST}-snapshots main" >> \
 /etc/apt/sources.list.d/${DIST}-icinga-snapshots.list
